entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
